What is Apollo?

  • Overview
  • Philosophy

Overview

Apollo is our new design language at IMS Health. It represents weightless conversation better than the Apollo orbiter? While we cannot walk every step of your journey with you, it is our sincere desire to layout principles that guide the direction of your odyssey.

Philosophy

A design language is a form of communication that, like any other, facilitates conveyance of an intended message to an audience. Any effective communication, verbal or visual, is made up of the same building blocks: context, delivery, and expression.
